name: Göldin
description:
Try to protect the village by killing those who seems to be a threat for the community. By pressing a key, you'll destroy the person affiliated.

Sacrifices must be made.

I've used the free Birthday Cake font by Michael Shillingburg, but I did everything else by myself during the jam, using mostly Construct 3, Gimp and Bosca Ceoil.
The game exist thanks to the advices, the cheering and the support of Marianne Vieulès, Camille Lartigue, Ysaline Debut and Nona Passiant.
